author: wmtan
body: This PR partially implements deep const correctness in FWLite by using the propagate_const template around most pointers (bare or smart) that are data members of classes or structs, and making the other changes required to do this. Pointers to const and pointers declared mutable do not need propagate_const. A very few pointers were left undone because the changes involved would be complex enough that more attention is required.
title: Implement propagate_const in FWLite
